issue.title: "Edit this page" on docstring generated docs gives 404
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16812](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16812). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Clicking on "Edit this page" on e.g. <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.ipc.new_file.html> goes to a non-existent page.
